We are not looking for solution, by seeking a solution youâ€™re just painting an image of how you fall short and there is something to solve. By creating an image of solution you are creating deficiency through thought, but what is there to solve in the first place? By thinking of a solution youâ€™re just  creating an imaginary solution to an imaginary problem.

Narratives are created right here right now. So when you embarrass yourself, or when you make a horrible mistake, or you have a lack your justification is simply a thought. Itâ€™s an imagination created from thin air about 1 particular interpretation. Itâ€™s entirely limited because thought only creates limits, it just slices reality. And then we latch onto that limitation thinking itâ€™s accurate. But that is not the all encompassing reality.

A person who feels lonely is entirely weighed down by his desire to not feel lonely. The person feels loneliness and desires to not feel lonely so he seeks a companion to fulfill that desire. Rather if you look at being alone you are simply alone, but loneliness makes you feel different than just being alone it makes you feel incomplete. Thus the desire of fulfilling the incompletion is what causes loneliness. 

There is no error with loneliness, it is a feeling and feelings are never wrong. They tell you everything you need. Iâ€™m not telling you to change or do anything, Iâ€™m just asking you to look truly at what loneliness is and who exactly is lonely.

Correct it is not eliminating lack because the lack is just imagined. There is no lack that exists or has ever existed. There is only an imagined separation between your current state of lacking and the desired state of completion. If you lack money then you can get more of it sure, but feeling 
inadequate and lacking in an emotional sense is a different phenomena. If you said â€œI need money or else I donâ€™t deserve another persons loveâ€ or something emotionally then that is a lack of which you require money to emotionally fill.

Looking for any justification is simply creating justification now through another thought. What justification is needed when choosing a bagel over pancakes in the morning? The only thing it comes down to is desire. Justification is always later, you could say that pancakes are too sweet but in that moment itâ€™s entirely the desire through the mind that dictates what is wanted. 

So any justification you create for the thought appearing is just a limitation placed upon another limitation. The whole thing is justification doesnâ€™t matter, what matters is how you feel right now. If you feel good you really donâ€™t need justification because happiness is the lack of problems, if you feel poor you need a lot of justifications for why you are in that poor state. 

> the content isnâ€™t the only thing is there 

Thinking only creates content and imagination. Even the â€œwhyâ€ is content based. You are creating some justification for why a certain thing is the way it is, which is entirely a limitation placed upon that scenario you label.

There are largely 3 reasons why we do self inquiry, itâ€™s because of either curiosity, we donâ€™t feel good/happy, or we donâ€™t feel complete. enquiry is supposed to bridge the gap of lack and complete, but youâ€™ll find enquiry doesnâ€™t add anything. It doesnâ€™t complete anything because thereâ€™s nothing missing. Thus we must question what lack is right here right now?
what underlying mechanism are you looking for? And what need is there to consider anything underlying whatsoever

> I am fundamentally inadequate and lacking

Requires separation of you and that which is deemed fulfilled. When you think of one who would be fulfilled what would they look like? What is separating you between that which is lacking (your current state) and that which is fulfilled (the desired state). The only separation that can be deemed is the belief that these two states differ whatsoever. The lack is a thought of one that lacks, the desire is a thought of one that is complete. These thoughts exist here now of lack and complete and thus since these are all thoughts there is no where to hide or strive towards.

Acting correctly is just a thought of some correct behavior and judging the illusory self of lacking this correctness. 

What is loneliness other than desire to be with someone? Itâ€™s not that being alone is bad or wrong, itâ€™s always the desire which thought dictates as not having reached the destination as lacking or failure. Rather if there was no desire to be with another there would be no feeling of loneliness. 

A fools errand would be to try to get rid of desiring as that would just be desiring to not have desires. But it must be assessed who are you that is being judged at all? Who said life is for anyone? Life just is and you just are.
